summary: Started the Figma MCP socket server using bunx cursor-talk-to-figma-socket. The WebSocket server is now running on port 3055 and listening for connections from the Figma plugin. The server is ready for bidirectional communication between Cursor and Figma.
current_status: Figma MCP integration is fully configured: MCP server configured in Cursor, socket server running on port 3055, and ready for Figma plugin connection. User needs to run the Cursor MCP Plugin in Figma to establish the connection.
